detaileddescription.para: Rationales: The HAL component is split in SW Units (hal_base, hal_common, hal_variant, gw_dev_msg, hal, hal_cfg, hal_cfg_gen, hal_defines_gen) because all of them are implementing different functionalities of this component. These SW units provides informations or functions needed by each others (e.g. HAL Base is needed by HAL Variant to set CAN/LIN to normal/sleep mode). This split is done for a better organization, understanding and maintenance of the code. Alternatives: SW Units are not big units. They are only doing the needed functionality and no alternatives can be found.
